comments.text:
+++ This bug was initially created as a clone of Bug #654894 +++

SECU_printCertProblemsOnDate (called also by SECU_printCertProblems) uses CERT_VerifyCertificate. These functions are used by vfyutil. We should add an option to use libpkix's CERT_PKIXVerifyCert.
